featured.text: The longer the pause, the stronger the heat pulse would be, causing more severe pain.
Speech that is slow, because it is laced with pauses or errors, is a more reliable indicator of lying than the opposite. 41.
They then learned to associate the length of the silent pause with the intensity of the upcoming heat pulse.
From the length of the pause between a tone and the heat pulse. 56.

definition.zh_def: 暫停，停止一段時間以便休息或思考。
definition.en_def: To temporarily stop or interrupt an action or process.
definition.example: Please pause the video so we can discuss what just happened.
